reviewText:
This is one of the best dramas ever made it combines romance ,adventure, loyalty, friendship and many other things to make it just enjoyable.
Like life it has its ups and downs for the characters but how they deal with them is just heartwarming. If there is one drama you want to watch this is clearly the one. An added bonus is the great subs they are hard to find in Chinese dramas . The young lady's in this drama are just adorable.
